DOC.brief_summary: Effects of Choral Hydrate on Induction, Maintenance, and Recovery from Sevoflurane Anesthesia in Day-case Pediatric Surgery
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Chloral Hydrate on Induction, Maintenance, and Recovery From Sevoflurane Anesthesia in Day-case Pediatric Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1. ASA I or II 2. 15 years children 3. elective daycase orchiopexy 1. congenital hear disease 2. renal disease 3. liver disease 4. growth retardation 5. coagulopathy
DOC.keyword: ASA physical status I or II
